decks.notes: This deck focuses on controlling the game tempo by aggressively disrupting the opponent's strategy while maintaining a fast and consistent offense. Cards like Force of Will, Daze, and Brainstorm allow for efficient counterplay and card selection, while cards like Fatal Push and Murktide Regent provide removal and threat potential. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student acts as a versatile utility card, offering card draw and potential removal. The deck aims to quickly build board presence and disrupt the opponent's game plan in order to secure a victory.

This Merfolk deck aims to quickly establish board presence with aggressive creatures like Master of the Pearl Trident and True-Name Nemesis, while disrupting the opponent with cards like Mistcaller and Sink into Stupor. The deck also utilizes Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play and Force of Will to protect its key threats. With cards like Lord of Atlantis boosting the power of all Merfolk creatures, this deck is focused on overwhelming the opponent with a fast and disruptive aggro strategy.

This Doomsday Combo deck focuses on assembling the necessary cards to cast Doomsday and then use it to set up a game-winning Thassa's Oracle combo. The deck includes acceleration cards like Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual to quickly cast Doomsday, along with disruption cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo. Personal Tutor can help search for key pieces while Vexing Bauble can be used for additional card advantage. The goal is to quickly and efficiently execute the Doomsday combo to win the game in a single turn.

The main theme of this deck is to quickly disrupt and overpower the opponent by playing aggressive creatures and utilizing cards that hinder the opponent's game plan. The deck focuses on playing cards like Blood Moon and Chalice of the Void to disrupt the opponent's mana base, while also utilizing aggressive creatures like Broadside Bombardiers and Pyrogoyf to quickly close out the game. The inclusion of powerful spells like Sundering Eruption and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker further solidify the deck's ability to control the game and come out on top.

The deck focuses on utilizing spells like Tibalt's Trickery, Creative Technique, and Throes of Chaos to cheat out powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Apex Devastator. By ramping up mana quickly with cards like Violent Outburst and Call Forth the Tempest, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with big, game-ending threats. The deck is designed to be fast and explosive, utilizing a combination of combo pieces and mana acceleration to win the game quickly before the opponent can establish their own game plan.

The deck focuses on disruption and control through counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. It aims to control the game by countering opponent's spells, removing threats, and drawing into key cards. By utilizing a combination of efficient removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Fatal Push, along with card advantage engines like Teferi, Time Raveler and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent while maintaining board control. With a mix of creatures like Murktide Regent and Baleful Strix, the deck can apply pressure while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the game by playing disruptive creatures and spells while utilizing powerful dragons to quickly close out the game. The deck aims to lock down opponents with Blood Moon and disrupt their resources with Sundering Eruption, while also utilizing fast mana sources like City of Traitors and Chrome Mox to quickly ramp into powerful threats. The dragons and powerful spells like Fury and Shatterskull Smashing provide a strong finisher to overwhelm opponents and secure victory.

The main concept of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to disrupt opponents using cards like Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer, while quickly ramping and putting pressure on the opponent with powerful Eldrazi creatures like Sowing Mycospawn and Glaring Fleshraker. The deck aims to control the board with land destruction cards like Wasteland and speed up mana production with cards like Ancient Tomb and Eldrazi Temple. The inclusion of cards like Kozilek's Command and Lotus Petal help provide additional utility and flexibility in different situations. This deck is designed to overwhelm opponents with aggression and disruption.
